contents: Article 31 (Budget Diversion) If the Chairman of the Board deems it unavoidable for budget execution, he may divert amounts from each item of the estimated income statement. However, expenses specifically determined by the general budget provisions cannot be diverted without the approval of the Minister of Health and Welfare. Revised 2008. 4. 2., 2010. 3. 30., 2016. 11. 14.
